summary: As the title says, you become a potato.
descriptionHtml:
[center][font=Lucida Sans Unicode][color=#6aa84f][size=4]What Is This?
[/size][/color]
[/font][/center][center][font=Lucida Sans Unicode][size=3]This mod adds equipable giant's club that deals tons of damage. You can get the club at High Hrothgar as you can see in the image. I also added one more club to somewhere in Whiterun interiors. Have fun :)
[/size]
[/font][/center][center][font=Lucida Sans Unicode][color=#6aa84f][size=4]How To Install This?[/size][/color]
[/font][/center][center][font=Lucida Sans Unicode][size=3]You can install it automatically with NMM or manually dragging the .esp to your data folder and then enabling it.[/size]
[/font][/center]
author: ProtologolusX
